net.tridentsdk.api

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TridentServer

    public interface Server
    The access to the server internals

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTask(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
      Asks the server to execute a task, will be run immediately on an alternate thread
      JsonConfig getConfig()
      The server configuration file
      int getCurrentPlayerCount()
      Returns the number of players currently on the server
      Difficulty getDifficulty()
      Gets the current difficulty that the server is set to (Worlds can have their own difficulty)
      EventManager getEventManager()
      Get the event manager
      org.slf4j.Logger getLogger()
      Gets the logger that Trident uses, not necessarily the same logger your plugin should be using
      int getMaxPlayers()
      Gets the maximum number of players allowed on the server
      java.lang.String getMotd()
      A string containing the current broadcast MOTD of the server
      java.io.File getMotdPicture()
      Returns the File that represents the picture displayed next to the server listing on clients
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getMotdPictureImage()
      Gets the BufferedImage that represents the Motd picture sent to clients
      Player getPlayer(java.util.UUID id) 
      TridentPluginHandler getPluginHandler()
      Get the Trident Plugin Handler
      int getPort()
      Gets the port the server currently runs on
      java.net.InetAddress getServerIp()
      Gets the Internet Address of this server
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      Gets the version of Trident that the server is currently running
      Window getWindow(int id)
      Gets an inventory window
      java.util.Set<World> getWorlds()
      Get all the worlds loaded on the server
      void sendPluginMessage(java.lang.String channel, byte... data)
      Send a plugin message
      int setMotdImage(java.awt.Image image)
      Sets the MOTD image sent to clients, may or may not take a server restart to take effect
      void shutdown()
      Closes the connections of the server, disconnects all clients, and unloads everything, then exits the JVM.

      • getMotdPicture

        java.io.File getMotdPicture()

        the file that represents the picture sent to clients when they ping the server
        See Also:
        for the representing the image sent to clients

        See Also:
        for the file itself

      • setMotdImage

        int setMotdImage(java.awt.Image image)
        Sets the MOTD image sent to clients, may or may not take a server restart to take effect
        Parameters:
        image - the image to set it to
        Returns:
        0 for success, -1 if this feature is disabled in config, -2 for generic failure

      • getMaxPlayers

        int getMaxPlayers()
        Gets the maximum number of players allowed on the server
        Returns:
        the maximum number of players the server will allow

        Returns:
